name: Girls Eliminate
description:
"Girls Eliminate" is a casual puzzle game. As long as you find 3 identical girls and move them in a straight line, you can eliminate them. If you reach the points required by the level, you can pass the level.
This game operation is suitable for playing for a while in spare time.

【Game Operation】

Click on a girl avatar with the left mouse button and drag it. After dragging, if there are 3 identical girl heads in a row, she will be eliminated.

【Game Features】

The difficulty of the game will become more and more difficult as the number of levels increases, and you need to have good observation skills to pass the level.
The game operation is simple and the atmosphere is relaxed. Suitable for people of all ages to play.
